actor

Class Orc

  • java.lang.Object
    • actor.Actor
      • actor.Orc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Orc
extends Actor
    The Orcis a subclass for Actor super class. The Orc creates new characters with derived attributes from the super class. Additional attributes are added to the subclasses: visibility and replenish
    Version:
    Lab Assignment 3: The Hobbit Battlefield Simulator
    Author:
    Elim Yao Tsiagbey
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
